planList.item: RPP CUSTOM NAME FOR TESTING Employer contributes money Pay less income tax up front Access money when you retire Converts into taxable retirement income Savings grow tax-free in the plan Select

DPSP DEFERRED PROFIT SHARING PLAN Only employer contributes money Get a share of the company's profits Savings grow tax-free in the plan Can transfer savings to an RRSP when you change employers Select
RRSP TESTING THE RRSP Save for retirement Pay less income tax up front Contribute up to personal limit Savings grow tax-free in the plan Pay tax on withdrawals Select
TFSA TAX-FREE SAVINGS ACCOUNT Save for short- or long-term goals Take out money tax-free Contribute up to annual limit Make after-tax contributions Grow savings tax-free Select
NRSP NON REGISTERED RSP Save for short- or long-term goals Make unlimited contributions Get taxable investment growth Select
EPSP TESTING CUSTOM SORT ORDER Employer generally contributes You make after-tax contributions Get taxable investment growth Select

errorMessage.expected: You need to select at least one plan before you can continue.
